bibl.title: From Gaza to Pelusium. Materials for the Historical Geography of North Sinai and Southwestern Palestine (332 BCE - 640 CE). (Beer-Sheva. Studies by the Department of Bible and Ancient Near East.)
bibl.publisher: Ben-Gurion University of the Negev Press
bibl.note: Introduction. - Part One. Historic Developments - A Comprehensive View: 1. Roads and Canals; - 2. The Written Evidence on the Settlements; - 3.
